import mne import yasa import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import seaborn as sns sns.set(font_scale=1.2)

# Load the EDF file raw = mne.io.read_raw_edf(‘SC4001E0-PSG.edf’, preload=True) raw.filter(0.1, 40) raw.plot() data = raw.get_data([‘EEG Fpz-Cz’, ‘EEG Pz-Oz’],units=”uV”) print(data.shape) sf=100

sp = yasa.spindles_detect(data, sf) sp.summary()

# Let’s get a bool vector indicating for each sample mask = sp.get_mask() mask

# Now let’s plot spindles_highlight = data * mask spindles_highlight[spindles_highlight == 0] = np.nan

# plt.figure(figsize=(14, 4)) # plt.plot(times, data, ‘k’) # plt.plot(times, spindles_highlight, ‘indianred’) # plt.xlabel(‘Time (seconds)’) # plt.ylabel(‘Amplitude (uV)’) # plt.xlim([0, times[-1]]) # plt.title(‘N2 sleep EEG data (2 spindles detected)’) # sns.despine() # plt.savefig(‘detection.png’, dpi=300, bbox_inches=’tight’)

import pandas as pd b = [[‘andy’, 1, 10],

[‘bob’, 2, 20], [‘charlie’, 3, 30]]

dfdf = pd.DataFrame(b) dfdf.columns = [‘Name’, ‘Number’, ‘Age’] dfdf[‘Place’] = 50 dfdf = dfdf.astype(object) dfdf.loc[0,’Place’] = [1, 2]
